main event: Two round circular objects were observed at high speed near Red Bluff, California on 24 August 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as a white fuzzy light with no sound., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds., The weather was reported as clear at the time of the sighting., An aircraft was noted in the area during the sighting., The final evaluation of the incident was probably attributed to a balloon.
witness description: Observer was located approximately 2 miles north of Red Bluff.
